author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Step2 Little Helper’s Shopping Cart Only $13.99 Shipped (Reg. $39.99) + More
text:
Kohl’s Cardholders! Through February 20th, hop on over to Kohl’s.com where all you Kohl’s cardholders can save 30% off your entire purchase with the code LOVE30 at checkout AND score FREE shipping with the code FEB4FREE. Plus, BOTH of these codes can be stacked together!
Plus, through February 15th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend online or in-store. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from February 16th-26th. Awesome!
Check out these Step2 Deal Ideas… Buy Step2 Little Helper’s Shopping Cart $19.99 (reg. $39.99) 
Enter the promo code LOVE30 (extra 30% off)
Enter the promo code FEB4FREE (free shipping)
Final cost $13.99 shipped!
Buy Step2 Little Helper’s Grocery Cart $43.99 (reg. $54.99) 
Enter the promo code LOVE30 (extra 30% off)
Enter the promo code FEB4FREE (free shipping)
Final cost $30.79 shipped!

Buy Step2 Lift & Roll Toy Box $48.99 (reg. $54.99) 
Enter the promo code LOVE30 (extra 30% off)
Enter the promo code FEB4FREE (free shipping)
Final cost $34.29 shipped!
Buy Step2 Fun Time Room Organizer $75.99 (reg. $84.99) 
Enter the promo code LOVE30 (extra 30% off)
Enter the promo code FEB4FREE (free shipping)
Final cost $53.19 shipped plus get $10 Kohl’s Cash!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (exp. 2/15). Shipping is free on $75 orders or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available.
(Thanks, Tori!)
